snippet: Senator Rob Portman of Ohio, drew a cool response from some in his party, where he has been a rising national star.
abstract: Ohio Sen Rob Portman, rising national star in Republican Party, says he has a gay son and can no longer justify his opposition to same-sex marriage; draws cool response from some in GOP.
lead_paragraph: Senator Rob Portman of Ohio, drew a cool response from some in his party, where he has been a rising national star.

headline.seo: G.O.P.’s Portman Says He Now Supports Gay Marriage
headline.main: G.O.P. Senator Says He Has a Gay Son, and Backs Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Senator Says He Has a Gay Son, and Backs Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
